lines.text: The fact that his robes are all charred... means he was in the fire, but he managed to put himself out.
I suppose, but I don't know what that means.
If he was on fire... was it an accident? How controlled was that burn, really?
Or... did he <c=#FF00FF>want</c> to set himself on fire? Would he have some reason to do that?
Don't ask me, kid. Figure it out!
